description:
“He’s here again.” Ruri’s words send nervous chills throughout Festa. Niza arrives at Festa once again, this time bringing Sara and a mysterious man in tow. By Sara’s request, Morina is yet again tasked to prepare a dish, but what can she make for the grandmaster? Here’s where Sara gives her a splendid idea!
Will the grandmaster find the result to his liking?!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: ズッパ・イングレーゼ
